name: Salem
description:
'''Salem''' (sometimes stylized as '''S4LEM''' or '''SALEM''') is an American [[electronic music]] band from [[Traverse City, Michigan]]. It was founded by Heather Marlatt, Jack Donoghue and John Holland. Salem is considered one of the pioneers of the [[witch house (genre)|witch house]] genre.

Salem released its debut album ''[[King Night]]'' in 2010. In 2020, the group released a mixtape, ''Stay Down'', followed by their second album, ''[[Fires in Heaven]]'', both without Marlatt, who is disputing her ouster.
